references.paper_title: Self-RAG: Learning to retrieve, generate, and critique through self-reflection
references.reason: This paper proposes Self-RAG, a method for improving reasoning ability in retrieval-augmented generation by enabling the model to learn from its own self-reflections.

references.paper_title: Unified active retrieval for retrieval augmented generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a unified active retrieval method that enhances retrieval-augmented generation by dynamically selecting the most relevant information.

references.paper_title: To retrieve or not to retrieve? uncertainty detection for dynamic retrieval augmented generation
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of determining when retrieval is necessary in RAG by introducing an uncertainty detection mechanism.

references.paper_title: AirRAG: Activating intrinsic reasoning for retrieval augmented generation via tree-based search
references.reason: This paper enhances RAG by modeling the retrieval process as a Markov Decision Process, enabling strategic and adaptive retrieval.

references.paper_title: Adaptive-RAG: Learning to adapt retrieval-augmented large language models through question complexity
references.reason: This paper focuses on adapting retrieval-augmented generation to the complexity of the questions, improving efficiency and accuracy.
